name: BlindWrite 6 Disc Image
summary: Learn about .B6I files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: B6I files may be saved along with a corresponding .B6T file. The B6I file contains the actual data to be copied and the B6T file contains information about the file structure of the disc. The B6T file should be opened in order to mount the disc image.
NOTE: BlindWrite 5 saved disc images as .B5I files, while previous versions of BlindWrite used the .BWI file extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
